sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"活着的，活的"之意。
means: alive ：其反义词为dead，指生命从奄奄一息到精力旺盛的各种状态。
live ：通常作定语，指活生生的，生气勃勃的，还可表示现场直播的。
living ：其反义词为dead，指包括人和动植物的生命没有消失、仍然存在的状态。

sentence.Network_en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentence.Network_en: I would imagine she's quite lonely living on her own.
sentence.Network_cn: 我猜想她一个人过肯定很孤独。

sentence.Network_en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 仁爱英语八年级上册单词表标准版 - 豆丁网 ... frog n. 青蛙 living adj. 活着的；n.生计 feed v. 喂(养)；饲养.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... lively a. 活泼的； 充满生气的 living a. 活着的 load n. 担子，货物.
高一英语词组 - 豆丁网 ... adv. 以实况的 living adj 活着的； 有生命的；现行的（前置定语； 表语） alive adj 活着的，.
Nevertheless , to kill any living being is an unwholesome thing to do ., 不过 , 杀害任何生物都是不道德的事.

list.abs: 九年级英语单词表 ... consider 考虑 lively 活泼的 sight 视力；景观；眼界.

字典中生字的解释 ... (3) 人的一生[ a lifetime] (5) 生活[ live] (8) 后生,长辈对晚辈的称呼[ offspring;descendent].
她的现场(live)非常稳定，NuABO的高音惊人，日本公演那场NuABO的飚高音特写，看到的她，大汗淋漓，汗水浸湿整个脸颊，湿漉 …

jx.jx_en_mean: show by one's existence and qualities that something is the case

lj.lj_ly: she is living proof that hard work need not be ageing.
lj.lj_ls: 工作辛苦不一定催人老，她就是个活生生的例子。

jx.jx_en_mean: within or during a time that is remembered by people still alive

lj.lj_ly: the worst recession in living memory.
lj.lj_ls: 人们记忆中最严重的经济衰退。

jx.jx_en_mean: an exact copy or likeness of

entry.def: The work that you do for a living is the work that you do in order to earn the money that you need.

example.ex: Father never talked about what he did for a living...
example.tran: 父亲从不谈他的谋生之道。

example.ex: He earns his living doing all kinds of things.
example.tran: 他做各种各样的活计来谋生。

entry.tran: 生活质量；生活素质；生活（方式）
entry.def: You use living when you are talking about the quality of people's  daily lives.

example.ex: Olivia has always been a model of healthy living.
example.tran: 奥利维娅一向是健康生活的楷模。

entry.def: You use living to talk about the places where people relax when they are not working.

example.ex: The spacious living quarters were on the second floor...
The study links the main living area to the kitchen.
example.tran: 书房把主要的生活区与厨房连在一起。

entry.def: The living are people who are alive, rather than people who have died.

example.ex: The young man is dead. We have only to consider the living.
example.tran: 这位年轻人已经死了。我们只能考虑在生之人。

entry.tran: 艰难度日，勉强糊口（美国英语中作scrape out a living或scratch out a living）
entry.def: If you say that someone scrapes a living or scratches a living, you mean that they manage to earn enough to live on, but it is very difficult. In American English, you say they scrape out a living or scratch out a living .

example.ex: He almost manages to scrape a living as an artist.
example.tran: 他靠当艺术家来勉强混口饭吃。

means.word_mean: 1. the experience of living; the course of human events and activities;

sentences.sentence: "he could no longer cope with the complexities of life"

means.word_mean: 3. the condition of living or the state of being alive;

sentences.sentence: "life depends on many chemical and physical processes"

means.word_mean: 4. the financial means whereby one lives;

sentences.sentence: "each child was expected to pay for their keep"
"he applied to the state for support"
"he could no longer earn his own livelihood"

means.word_mean: 3. dwelling or inhabiting; often used in combination;

sentences.sentence: "scared the living daylights out of them"
"beat the living hell out of him"
"the Wollemi pine found in Australia is a surviving specimen of a conifer thought to have been long extinct and therefore known as a living fossil"
"the only surviving frontier blockhouse in Pennsylvania"

means.word_mean: 7. (used of minerals or stone) in its natural state and place; not mined or quarried;

auth_sentence.content: Living with a heroin habit is living a nightmare.
auth_sentence.res_content: Living with a heroin habit is living a nightmare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Living with a heroin habit is living a nightmare.

auth_sentence.content: Is the rainbow nation living up to its promise?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is the rainbow nation living up to its promise?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is the rainbow nation living up to its promise?

auth_sentence.content: It leaves the living part of the tree untouched.
auth_sentence.res_content: It leaves the living part of the tree untouched.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It leaves the living part of the tree untouched.

Sentence.sentence: The unique surroundings of his living place.
living separately would be too costly
An Ohio State University study also found that black students living with a white roommate saw higher academic success throughout their college careers.

Smith touches on construction methods, the revolutionary invention of the automatic lift, the practicalities of living in the sky and the likelihood that, as cities become more crowded, apartment living will become the norm.

sentences.en: Is the old man still living?

means.word_mean: 现存的, 在使用中的

sentences.cn: 英语是现代使用着的语言。

sentences.en: He made a living by writing.

jushi.english: He had ascertained that his son-in-law was among the living prisoners.
jushi.chinese: 他已查明,他女婿在活着的囚犯之中。

jushi.english: He is the greatest living poet.
jushi.chinese: 他是当代最伟大的诗人。

jushi.english: My family has a living picture on the wall.
jushi.chinese: 我家墙上有一幅逼真的图画。
